facet_1.name: Tangled
facet_1.effects: Shackleshot now applies to all enemy units and trees behind the unit-targeted enemy within the search range. Each secondary enemy hero that Lyralei successfully shackels temporarily grants her bonus attack damage.

facet_2.name: Killshot
facet_2.effects: The Powershot arrow instant kills enemy heroes below a certain max health threshold corresponding to its channel time.

effects: Grants Lyralei an invisibility that does not break by attacking or casting any abilities, and reduces incoming physical attack damage taken while active.
Summons a strong wind that pulls all enemies in the area-targeted location toward the vector-targeted direction.

abilities.name: Easy Breezy
abilities.description: Increases the max movement speed cap, and Lyralei cannot be slowed below a minimum movement speed.
abilities.details: Leash sources have precedence over min movement speed sources.

ability_1.name: Shackleshot
ability_1.details: Shackles the targeted-unit to another enemy unit or tree in a line directly behind it.
ability_1.description: Windranger's variety of bow skills includes an arrow with thick ropes attached to encumber any escaping target.
technical_details: The projectile searches for a valid and furthest enemy unit or furthest tree within 46Â° at the unit-targeted enemy's opposite side
The search area-of-effect is triangle-shaped, with line having a 575-height
interaction_notes: Nullifies the ability with Spell Block
Does not proc Spell Block sources on secondary affected targets

ability_2.name: Powershot
ability_2.details: Charges her bow up briefly for a single powerful shot. The longer the charge, the potent the arrow fired. The arrow damages and slows all enemy units along its path. Reduces damage by a factor per enemy unit hit.
ability_2.description: During her early years of training, Lyralei learned to fire powerful arrows that cleaved even trees to reach their targets on the other side.
technical_details: Damage Factor per Hit: 0.85 (1 with talent)
interaction_notes: Affects units up to 3125 range away
Grants flying vision as projectile travels

ability_3.name: Windrun
ability_3.details: Grants self movement speed bonus and absolute evasion, evading all incoming physical attacks.
ability_3.description: Lyralei enchants gusts of winds to flight incoming attacks.
technical_details: Scepter: Fade Time: 0.2, Damage Reduction: 45%, Invisibility Duration: 3/4/5/6
interaction_notes: With Scepter: invisibility does not break by attacking or casting abilities

ability_4.name: Gale Force
ability_4.details: Summons a strong wind that pulls all enemies in the area-targeted location toward the vector-targeted direction.
ability_4.description: At last Lyralei has learned to call upon the might of her true birthright.
interaction_notes: Creates a negative aura that applies non-disabling pull
Roshan and Tormentor are immune to forced movement

ability_5.name: Focus Fire
ability_5.details: Grants self a massive attack speed bonus against a single enemy unit or enemy building, while sacrificing a portion of her own attack damage. Does not reduce the potency of attack modifier sources or on-hit effects.
ability_5.description: Lyralei's ability to bombard opponents with a flurry of arrows is unparalleled - even at the expense of accuracy.
technical_details: Cooldown Skip on Target Death: 18 seconds (with talent)
interaction_notes: Cast range equals hero attack range
Cannot be cast on hidden, invulnerable, or ward-type units

changes: Shackleshot Tangled: Increased attack damage bonus per hero from 12/20/28/36 to 40 on each level
Shackleshot Tangled: Reduced buff duration from 6 on each level to 3/4/5/6
Increased Powershot cast range from 2600 to 3000
Increased Focus Fire self attack damage factor 0.7 to 0.75
Gale Force: Reduced cast range from 1500 to 1200
Gale Force: Reduced radius from 1000 to 900
Increased base attack damage from 21â33 to 24â36
Powershot Killshot instant kill ability component no longer interacts with damage negation sources and min health sources
Increased Shackleshot stun duration from 1.6/2.1/2.6/3.1 to 1.75/2.25/2.75/3.25
